entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
